concept.title: Enable SSL
concept.shortdesc: You can enable the RPC pipelines to transfer data securely using SSL. To use SSL, enable SSL for both the RPC destination and the RPC origin.

conbody.p:
RPC pipelinesenabling SSLenabling SSLin RPC pipelines - origin and destinationYou need the following information to enable SSL in both stages:
A keystore file with the private keys of the SSL certificate, and the password for the file.
For self-signed certificates, a truststore file with the public key of the SSL certificate of the RPC origin, and the password for the file.

To enable SSL:
Save the keystore and the truststore files in the resources directory: <SDCinstalldir>/resources.
In the RPC destination, enter the truststore file name and password when using a self-signed certificate.
In the RPC origin, enter the keystore file name and password.
